pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Quality Visualizations of Large, High-Dimensional Datasets // Implements the largeVis algorithm (see Tang, et al. (2016) DOI:10.1145/2872427.2883041) for visualizing very large high- dimensional datasets. Also very fast search for approximate nearest neighbors; outlier detection; and optimized implementations of the HDBSCAN*, DBSCAN and OPTICS clustering algorithms; plotting functions for visualizing the above.
